articles.author: Marvin Charles
articles.title: EFF, SAHRC welcome SCA ruling preventing City of CT evictions - News24
articles.description: The South African Human Rights Commission and the EFF have welcomed the ruling, which stems from the eviction of Bulelani Qolani.
articles.content:
• The SAHRC and the EFF welcomed the ruling by the SCA to dismiss the City of Cape Town's appeal against an interim ruling. 
  • The case stems from the eviction of Bulelani Qolani.
